events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on the skills and experience you listed.
A recruiter specializing in software development positions has been assigned to guide you through the process.
Your initial screening call is scheduled to discuss your background and motivation for the Software Engineer position.
Thank you for your prompt response and for confirming your availability for the next interview steps.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 18th to evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview. The interviewers were impressed with your solutions.
Your HR interview is set for May 22nd to discuss your fit with company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and they expressed enthusiasm about your potential contribution.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position including competitive benefits and salary.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer details and expressed eagerness to join the team.
You have accepted the offer and officially joined our Software Engineering team. Welcome aboard!
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation sessions and access setup for all engineering tools.
The hiring process is now complete. We look forward to your impactful contributions as part of the engineering team.
